nodes.text: Saga Edition Preview 7: Skirmish at the Sarlacc Pit

Saga Edition Preview 7: Skirmish at the Sarlacc Pit is an article written by Rodney Thompson and Gary M. Sarli, and released by Wizards of the Coast on May 17, 2007. It provides a preview scenario for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition Core Rulebook.
